definition:
A subset $A$ of a poset $(P,<_P)$ is an *antichain* if no two elements
are comparable. That is, if $a,b\in A$ then $a\nless_P b$ and
$b\nless_P a$.

A *maximal antichain* of $T$ is one which is maximal.

In particular, if $(P,<_P)$ is a tree then the maximal antichains are
exactly those antichains which intersect every branch, and if the tree
is splitting then every level is a maximal antichain.
